title: Link a Katalon test case with an Xray test issue
description: Katalon - Xray integration allows you to link a Katalon test case with an Xray test issue. As a prerequisite, you must have an Xray test issue created on Jira. To create an Xray test issue on Jira, see Create an Xray test.

frontMatter.title: Link a Katalon test case with an Xray test issue

previous.title: Configure Xray Integration in Katalon TestOps
